name: The Midnight Park
description:
Run away from reality and escape into the Midnight Park, a place where everything is safe and friendly...

The Midnight Park is a surrealistic exploration game about wandering through a dream-like park alone at night. Immerse yourself in a little world of vibrancy and nature, but wander away into the forest and you may encounter some strange surprises.

This game is an experiment in visual style, supernatural themes and environmental storytelling, made over several weeks just for fun.

I hope you enjoy your stay!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Music was made for this game by Carl Powell. Check out his audio portfolio: https://carlpowellmusic.bandcamp.com/

He's open for work if you're looking for some audio for your game! For business enquiries, send him an email at carlpowell456@gmail.com

(It's strongly recommended that you play this game with music!)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

I'd love to hear any feedback you may have; feel free to leave a comment or contact me on Twitter: @pixsule

Thanks <3
